name: echobot
description:
You are surrounded by waves of evil robots that want to destroy you. In a dark cargo hold on a spacecraft you can hear on the hum and crackle of each robot as it hovers nearby.

Using only your ears, place the robots in front of you by rotating (LEFT  / A and RIGHT / D keys) and shoot them down (SPACE).

You have 3 minutes to rid yourself of all enemies and have limited health. You need to survive.
Put on your headphones...


John Henry - Coding and Integration
Stuart Cunningham - Sound Design

Made with FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.

Ambience recording used: Geelong Refinery by Stephan Schutze.
